ARABIC: فَٱذْكُرُونِىٓ أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لِى وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Remember Me - I will remember you. Give thanks to Me and do not be ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, therefore, remember Me, and I shall remember you; and give thanks and do not be ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So remember Me and I will remember you, and give thanks to Me and be not ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: therefore, remember Me and I shall remember you. Thank Me and do not hide the truth about Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore remember Me, I will cause you to be spoken of and acknowledge My rights, and do not be ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therefore remember Me (by praying, glorifying). I will remember you, and be grateful to Me (for My countless favors on you) and never be ungrateful to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore remember Me, I will remember you, and be thankful to Me, and do not be ungrateful to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So remember Me, and I will remember you; and be thankful to Me; and be you not ungrateful towards Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefore remember Me, I will remember you. Give thanks to Me, and reject not Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So remember Me; I will remember you. Be thankful to Me and do not be ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Remember Me wherefore, and I shall remember you: and unto Me give thanks, and be notingrate unto Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Remember Me and I will remember you, and thank Me, and do not be ungrateful to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then do ye remember Me; I will remember you. Be grateful to Me, and reject not Faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therefore remember Me (by praying, glorifying, etc.). I will remember you, and be grateful to Me (for My countless Favours on you) and never be ungrateful to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So remember Me, I will remember you. Give thanks to Me and do not be ungrateful towards Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So remember Me, and I will remember you. And thank Me, and do not be ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:152] So remember Me, through prayer, glorification and the like, I will remember you: this is said to mean, ‘I will reward you’; in a hadīth about God [that He says]: ‘whoever remembers Me in himself, I will remember him in Myself, and whoever remembers Me in an assembly, I will remember him in an Assembly more excellent than his’; and be thankful to Me, for My grace, by being obedient, and be not ungrateful towards Me, through disobedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore remember Me) through the performance of acts of obedience, (I will remember you) by granting you Paradise; and it is also said that this means: remember Me in time of ease, I will remember you in times of hardship. (Give thanks to Me) for the blessings I bestowed upon you, (and reject not Me) do not stop 25 giving thanks for these blessings.
